QuestData.Title: Time In Your Hands
QuestData.Description: Inhabitants of this strange island barter with a special currency, immune from the fickle fluctuations of time.$b$bYou would do well to gather as many of these "timeless coins" as possible! They can be found hidden away in small caches, or gathered from creatures all around the island. Larger, rarer creatures are a better source of coins - you may find it profitable to venture forth as part of a group.$b$bIntroduce yourself to Mistweavers Ai and Ku across the Celestial Court, and gather some coins for me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather $1oa Timeless Coins and introduce yourself to Mistweaver Ai and Mistweaver Ku.
